attributes.action: To not cancel any elections to be held this year
attributes.additional_details:
Apparently parliament are considering cancelling this years Mayor of London election, however last year it was meant to take place and was put forward to this year. How long will citizens be suppressed for our democratic right to vote? 
If safety is an issue allow all vulnerable & elderly citizens to recieve mail in ballots and of course social distancing, masks and sanitation will be put in place for polling stations.
attributes.background: To let all elections over the country take place this year, we already delayed the Mayor of London election, this is unacceptable as we are a democracy.
